skill.name: fiftyone-dataset-inference
skill.description: Create a FiftyOne dataset from a directory of media files (images, videos, point clouds), optionally import labels in common formats (COCO, YOLO, VOC), run model inference, and store predictions. Use when users want to load local files into FiftyOne, apply ML models for detection, classification, or segmentation, or build end-to-end inference pipelines.
skill.summary: Create a FiftyOne dataset from a directory of media files (images, videos, point clouds), optionally...
skill.author: AdonaiVera

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and workflow instructions. No executable code, no file access, no network operations. All operations are delegated to legitimate MCP tools with transparent parameter passing.

content.value_statement: Loading local media files into FiftyOne and running ML model inference requires understanding dataset creation, label imports, and model application. This skill provides step-by-step guidance for creating datasets, importing labels in standard formats, and applying zoo models for detection, classification, and segmentation tasks.
actual_capabilities: Create FiftyOne datasets from media directories (images, videos, point clouds)
Import labeled datasets in COCO, YOLO, VOC, and other formats
Apply zoo models for detection, classification, segmentation, and embeddings
Build end-to-end ML inference pipelines with validation steps
Launch FiftyOne App for interactive visualization
Use directory structure for image classification datasets
limitations: Requires FiftyOne MCP server to be installed and running
Does not include model weights or training capabilities
Cannot modify existing datasets without delete and recreate

use_cases.title: Load Images and Detect Objects
use_cases.description: Create dataset from image directory and apply YOLOv8 or Faster R-CNN for object detection

use_cases.title: Import COCO Dataset
use_cases.description: Import existing COCO-formatted dataset and add model predictions for comparison with ground truth

use_cases.title: YOLO Dataset Evaluation
use_cases.description: Import YOLOv5 dataset format and evaluate model performance with FiftyOne visualization

prompt_templates.title: Load Images Only
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the fiftyone-dataset-inference skill to create a dataset from /path/to/images. Load only media files, no labels. Name the dataset my-images. Then apply faster-rcnn-resnet50-fpn-coco-torch model for object detection.

prompt_templates.title: Import with Labels
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the fiftyone-dataset-inference skill to import a COCO dataset from /path/to/images and /path/to/annotations.json. Create dataset called coco-dataset with ground_truth field. Then apply yolov8n-coco-torch for predictions.

prompt_templates.title: Directory Classification
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the fiftyone-dataset-inference skill to create an image classification dataset from /path/to/dataset. The structure is folder-per-class (cats/, dogs/). Name the dataset classification-dataset with ground_truth field.

prompt_templates.title: Custom Model
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the fiftyone-dataset-inference skill to create a dataset called test-set from /path/to/images. Apply clip-vit-base32-torch model for embeddings. Launch the app to visualize results.

output_examples.input: Create a dataset from my_images folder and run YOLOv8 detection
output: Run set_view(exists=['predictions']) to filter samples with detections

best_practices: Always explore the directory first to detect media types and label formats before importing
Confirm dataset name and label field settings with user before creating datasets
Check for missing dependencies when models fail and offer to install required packages
anti_patterns: Skipping directory exploration and attempting to import without knowing the format
Creating datasets without confirming settings with the user
Ignoring dependency errors when model application fails

faq.question: What platforms support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code when FiftyOne MCP server is available.

faq.question: How many images can I import?
faq.answer: Dataset size is limited by system memory. Use smaller models for large datasets.

faq.question: Can I integrate with external tools?
faq.answer: Uses MCP operators. Install additional plugins for features like export or augmentation.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Skill only provides instructions. All data access happens through FiftyOne MCP server tools.

faq.question: Why did my import fail?
faq.answer: Check file paths are absolute, formats match supported types, and dependencies are installed.

faq.question: How is this different from manual FiftyOne scripts?
faq.answer: Provides validated workflow templates that prevent common errors and ensure best practices.
